name: bj-ccinftyssccbar

body.origin:
|- wss(cccinfty, cccbar)
-| wss(cccinfty, cun(cc, cccinfty))
-| wceq(cccbar, cun(cc, cccinfty))
body.pretty:
⊢ CCinfty ⊆ CCbar
⊣ CCinfty ⊆(ℂ ⋃ CCinfty)
⊣ CCbar =(ℂ ⋃ CCinfty)

cumulated.origin:
|- wss(cccinfty, cccbar)
-| wss(cccinfty, cun(cc, cccinfty))
-| wceq(cccbar, cun(cc, cccinfty))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ CCinfty ⊆ CCbar
⊣ CCinfty ⊆(ℂ ⋃ CCinfty)
⊣ CCbar =(ℂ ⋃ CCinfty)

comment: Infinite extended complex numbers are extended complex numbers. (Contributed by BJ, 27-Jun-2019.)
